Wisdom: الرِّزْقُ مَقْسُومٌ الْحَرِيصُ مَحْرُومٌ
enWisdom: The sustenance has been apportioned; the greedy has been deprived [of what he seeks beyond his share]

Wisdom: الْحَظُّ يَسْعَى إِلَى مَنْ لَا يَخْطُبُهُ
enWisdom: Fortune rushes towards the one who does not seek it

Wisdom: الْمَعُونَةُ تَنْزِلُ مِنَ اللَّهِ عَلَى قَدْرِ الْمَئُونَةِ
enWisdom: Succour descends from Allah to the extent of one’s requirement

Wisdom: تَنْزِلُ مِنَ اللَّهِ الْمَعُونَةُ عَلَى قَدْرِ الْمَئُونَةِ
enWisdom: Assistance comes down from Allah to the extent of the provisions [that are required for sustenance]

Wisdom: حَسْبُكَ مِنْ تَوَكُّلِكَ أَنْ لَا تَرَى لِرِزْقِكَ مُجْرِياً إِلَّا اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ
enWisdom: It is sufficient for your trust [in Allah] that you consider no one else as a channel for acquiring your sustenance other than Allah, the Glorified

Wisdom: رِزْقُ كُلِّ امْرِئٍ مُقَدَّرٌ كَتَقْدِيرِ أَجَلِهِ
enWisdom: The sustenance of every person is preordained just as the end of his life is predetermined

Wisdom: سَوْفَ يَأْتِيكَ مَا قُدِّرَ لَكَ فَخَفِّضْ فِي الْمُكْتَسَبِ
enWisdom: That which has been decreed for you will come to you, so take it easy in your earning

Wisdom: عَلَى قَدْرِ الْمَئُونَةِ تَكُونُ مِنَ اللَّهِ الْمَعُونَةُ
enWisdom: To the extent of the need, there is succour from Allah

Wisdom: عَجِبْتُ لِمَنْ عَلِمَ أَنَّ اللَّهَ قَدْ ضَمِنَ الْأَرْزَاقَ وَقَدَّرَهَا وَأَنَّ سَعْيَهُ لَا يَزِيدُهُ فِيمَا قُدِّرَ لَهُ وَهُوَ حَرِيصٌ دَائِبٌ فِي طَلَبِ الرِّزْقِ
enWisdom: The companion of vices is the hostage of [his] misdeeds

Wisdom: كُلُّكُمْ عِيَالُ اللَّهِ وَاللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ كَافِلُ عِيَالِهِ
enWisdom: All of you are the dependants of Allah, and Allah, the Glorified, takes care of His dependants

Wisdom: لَنْ يَفُوتَكَ مَا قُسِمَ لَكَ فَأَجْمِلْ فِي الطَّلَبِ
enWisdom: That which has been apportioned for you will never escape you so be moderate in what you seek

Wisdom: لَنْ يَغْلِبَكَ عَلَى مَا قُدِّرَ لَكَ غَالِبٌ
enWisdom: Nobody will ever overcome you in getting that which has been decreed for you

Wisdom: مَنْ وَثِقَ بِقَسْمِ اللَّهِ لَمْ يَتَّهِمْهُ فِي الرِّزْقِ
enWisdom: One who trusts in the allotment of Allah does not blame Him with regards to sustenance

Wisdom: لَا تَحْمِلْ هَمَّ يَوْمِكَ الَّذِي لَمْ يَأْتِكَ عَلَى يَوْمِكَ الَّذِي قَدْ أَتَاكَ فَإِنَّهُ إِنْ يَكُنْ مِنْ عُمُرِكَ يَأْتِكَ اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ فِيهِ بِرِزْقِكَ وَإِنْ لَمْ يَكُنْ مِنْ عُمُرِكَ فَمَا هَمُّكَ [فَلَا تَهْتَمَ‏] بِمَا لَيْسَ مِنْ أَجَلِكَ
enWisdom: Do not let the worry of the day which has not come upon you bear on the day which has [already] come upon you, for indeed if it will be from your lifetime, [then] Allah, the Glorified, will grant your sustenance in it and if it is not from your lifetime then what worry do you have for that which is not for you?!

Wisdom: لَا تَحْمِلْ عَلَى يَوْمِكَ هَمَّ سَنَتِكَ كَفَاكَ كُلَّ يَوْمٍ مَا قُدِّرَ لَكَ فِيهِ فَإِنْ تَكُنِ السَّنَةُ مِنْ‏ عُمُرِكَ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ سَيَأْتِيكَ فِي كُلِّ غَدٍ جَدِيدٍ بِمَا قَسَمَ لَكَ وَإِنْ لَمْ تَكُنْ عُمُرَكَ فَمَا هَمُّكَ بِمَا لَيْسَ لَكَ
enWisdom: Do not put the worry of your [entire] year on your dayThat which is apportioned for you each day suffices for you in itThen if you are to live another year, verily Allah, the Glorified, will bring to you what He has apportioned for you in each new day and if you will not live that long then why are you worried about that which is not for you?

Wisdom: لَا يَمْلِكُ إِمْسَاكَ الْأَرْزَاقِ وَإِدْرَارَهَا إِلَّا الرَّزَّاقُ
enWisdom: No one possesses the ability to withhold sustenance or to bestow it except the Sustainer

Wisdom: الرِّزْقُ يَطْلُبُ مَنْ لَا يَطْلُبُهُ
enWisdom: Sustenance seeks the one who does not seek it

Wisdom: الْأَرْزَاقُ لَا تُنَالُ بِالْحِرْصِ وَالْمُطَالَبَةِ
enWisdom: Sustenance is not acquired by greed or by being sought after

Wisdom: إِنَّ اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ أَبَى أَنْ يَجْعَلَ أَرْزَاقَ عِبَادِهِ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ إِلَّا مِنْ حَيْثُ لَا يَحْتَسِبُونَ
enWisdom: Verily Allah, the Glorified, dislikes to put the sustenance of his believing servants except [in places] from where they least expect it

Wisdom: رِزْقُكَ يَطْلُبُكَ فَأَرِحْ نَفْسَكَ مِنْ طَلَبِهِ
enWisdom: Your sustenance is seeking you, so spare yourself the trouble of seeking it

Wisdom: قَصِّرْ مِنْ حِرْصِكَ وَقِفْ عِنْدَ الْمَقْدُورِ لَكَ مِنْ رِزْقِكَ تُحْرِزْ دِينَكَ
enWisdom: Reduce your greed and remain [satisfied] with what has been allocated to you of your sustenance, [by this] you will protect your faith

Wisdom: لِكُلِّ رِزْقٍ سَبَبٌ فَأَجْمِلُوا فِي الطَّلَبِ
enWisdom: For every sustenance there is a means, so be moderate in your seeking [it]

Wisdom: لَنْ يَسْبِقَكَ إِلَى رِزْقِكَ طَالِبٌ
enWisdom: No [other] seeker will ever overtake you in [acquiring] your sustenance

Wisdom: لَيْسَ كُلُّ طَالِبٍ بِمَرْزُوقٍ
enWisdom: Not every seeker is granted [sustenance]

Wisdom: لَيْسَ كُلُّ مُجْمِلٍ بِمَحْرُومٍ
enWisdom: Not everyone who is moderate in seeking [his livelihood] is deprived

Wisdom: لَيْسَ كُلُّ مَنْ أَضَلَّ فَقَدَ
enWisdom: Not everyone who turns away, loses

Wisdom: لَمْ يَفُتْ نَفْساً مَا قُدِّرَ لَهَا مِنَ الرِّزْقِ
enWisdom: That sustenance which has been decreed for a soul shall not escape it

Wisdom: لَمْ يَصْدُقْ يَقِينُ مَنْ أَسْرَفَ فِي الطَّلَبِ وَأَجْهَدَ نَفْسَهُ فِي الْمُكْتَسَبِ
enWisdom: The certitude of one who is extravagant in his wants and exerts himself in acquisition [of wealth] it is not true

Wisdom: لَوْ جَرَتِ الْأَرْزَاقُ بِالْأَلْبَابِ وَالْعُقُولِ لَمْ تَعِشِ الْبَهَائِمُ وَالْحَمْقَى
enWisdom: If sustenance was bestowed based on understanding and intellect, the animals and foolish ones would not live

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يُعْطِ قَاعِداً لَمْ يُعْطَ قَائِماً
enWisdom: One who does not give while he is sitting [in comfort] will not be given when he is standing [in a state of struggle]

Wisdom: مَنِ اهْتَمَّ بِرِزْقِ غَدٍ لَمْ يُفْلِحْ أَبَداً
enWisdom: One who is [too] concerned about his next day’s sustenance will never be successful

Wisdom: لَا يُنَالُ الرِّزْقُ بِالتَّعَنِّي
enWisdom: Sustenance is not acquired by toiling [for it]

Wisdom: يَطْلُبُكَ رِزْقُكَ أَشَدُّ مِنْ طَلَبِكَ لَهُ فَأَجْمِلْ فِي طَلَبِهِ
enWisdom: Your sustenance seeks you with more intensity than you seek it, so be moderate in what you seek

Wisdom: رُبَّ سَاعٍ لِقَاعدٍ
enWisdom: NULL

Wisdom: رُبَّ سَاهِرٍ لِرَاقِدٍ
enWisdom: NULL

Wisdom: كَمْ مِنْ طَالِبٍ خَائِبٍ وَمَرْزُوقٍ غَيْرِ طَالِبٍ
enWisdom: How many a seeker is deprived while the one who does not seek is granted [sustenance]
